155.movie_plot: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

147.movie_plot: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

158.movie_plot: A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant than he is.

165.movie_plot: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

146.movie_plot: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

179.movie_plot: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

178.movie_name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai (1999)

152.movie_plot: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

149.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

184.movie_plot: An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.

180.movie_plot: Hollywood movers and shakers dissect their own personal lives when everything seems to clash together.

187.movie_plot: A stonemason steadfastly pursues a cousin he loves. However their love is troubled as he is married to a woman who tricked him into marriage and she is married to a man she does not love.

173.movie_plot: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

182.movie_plot: A workaholic needs a date for a dinner with new important clientele, but who his brother sets him up with could lead to disaster.

183.movie_plot: Mohamed, a young blind boy, returns to his rural home for the summer and yearns for his father's acceptance.

166.movie_plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

50.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

12.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

63.movie_plot: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

118.movie_plot: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

2.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

53.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

26.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

34.movie_plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

122.movie_plot: A barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his parents and his tribe whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his henchmen when he was a boy.

73.movie_plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

28.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)

0.movie_plot: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

91.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

57.movie_plot: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

109.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
